description.title: Offer description
description.new_user: Q1: I am a new user. Why can't I enjoy the discount offered by new users?
description.new_user_note1: new users refer to the equipment number, mobile phone number and platform account of the order you placed on the dragon food platform for the first time.Any of the above conditions are not met, can not enjoy the new user discount.
description.new_user_note2: if you fail to meet the above credit conditions, your order will be blocked by the system or cancelled for free.
description.new_user_note3: new users can't use all the items at the same time.In the process of your first order, we will give priority to you to choose the one with the largest discount (with the highest discount amount) among the old user activity and new user volume reduction.
description.first_order: Q2: the first order has been canceled. Can we enjoy the discount for new users if we place the order again?
description.first_order_note1: if you cancel the order voluntarily or the dealer or rider cancels the order, long takeout will return your new user qualification, and you can still enjoy the new user discount.
description.first_order_note2: the first order that you cancel because [the payment account used has been issued], you must change the payment account to enjoy the new user discount.
description.first_order_note3: however, the reason for your cancellation is the account exception and other reasons, so you cannot enjoy the new user discount.
description.shop_first: Q3: for the first time, I placed an order at “A”.“A” has participated in [new user account] activities. Why can't I enjoy the discount for new users?
description.shop_first_note: new users in the event refer to the new users of the dragon food delivery platform, not to the new customers of “A” merchants. If you do not meet the definition of new users of the dragon food delivery platform, you will not be able to enjoy the discounts related to new users.

living_payment.allow_amount: Allowed Transaction Amount is PhP500 to PhP50,000

living_payment.psd_lock: Excessive wrong entering of password result in 10 minutes lockout. Please select other payment method or forget password button.
